data.text: Below is a NextJS component serves as an announcement slider for a website that I am building, employing hooks like useState, useEffect, and useMemo. It utilizes the jotai state management library with the useStore and useAtomValue hooks to manage app states. The slider allows navigation between announcements through buttons, while the data is fetched asynchronously using the fetchData utility. The component dynamically renders announcements based on fetched data, and each announcement may include an optional link.
sanity client utility function, which creates a sanity client with the given dataset name which is set as enviroment variables.
getData utility function that calls sanity client to fetch data from a dataset.
